text: Cheaha Mountain, often called Mount Cheaha, is the tallest point in the State of Alabama. It is 2,407 feet (734 meters) tall. Mount Cheaha is a quartzite rock mountain. Mount Cheaha is the southeasternmost point of the Appalachian Mountains. Mount Cheaha is protected in Cheaha State Park. The nearest city to Mount Cheaha is Talladega. Category:Mountains of the United States Category:Geography of Alabama Category:Appalachian Mountains
title: Mount Cheaha
